Introduction

Kim Younghoon is a South Korean model, singer, and actor under ONE HUNDRED. Back then, Younghoon was an athlete who joined national swimming competitions until he was scouted while eating bread at a convenience store. Following this, he became a model and idol trainee.

Younghoon appeared in several music videos, such as IOI's "Whatta Man" and Melody Day's "Colors" in 2016, until he eventually made his official debut in 2017 as the visual and one of the vocalists of the boy group THE BOYZ.

In 2020, Younghoon made his acting debut through the romantic-comedy teen drama series "Love Revolution."
